entry.title: Chapter 1 - Story - Welcome to Whiskerton
entry.summary: Once upon a time, in a land far from here (though closer than you may think), was a little town called Whiskerton. Though little, the town was far from ordinary. Not only was it home to a coterie of curious cats, Whiskerton abided by the laws of quantum physics. That’s why its feline residents loved it so dearly.
